name: Peppers and Onions
keywords: bell pepper, onion, dairy-free, gluten-free, low calorie, low cholesterol, low-fat, nut-free, vegan, vegetarian, side dish
recipeIngredient: 12 ounces whole onion or 11 ounces sliced, ready-cut onions (2 to 2 1/2 cups)
1 1/2 pounds red, yellow, orange and/ or purple peppers or 18 ounces sliced, ready-cut peppers (4 1/2 to 5 cups)

recipeInstructions.text: Heat nonstick skillet until it is very hot; reduce heat to medium high and add oil. When it is hot, add onions and saute while preparing peppers.
Wash, trim and seed peppers; slice in food processor and add to onions, cooking for a couple of minutes until they begin to soften.
Add vinegar, salt and pepper; cover and continue cooking over medium-low heat for about 10 minutes, until peppers are soft.
